character.name: Goku

traits.intelligence: average, but extremely clever in battle
traits.loyalty: highly loyal to friends and family

quirks: Loves food, especially rice and meat
Can be naive and overly trusting
Has an insatiable desire to fight stronger opponents

speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks in short, straightforward sentences, often with excitement and optimism.

name: Vegeta

traits.loyalty: fiercely loyal to his family, but also has pride

quirks: Often refers to himself as the 'Prince of all Saiyans'
Has a rivalry with Goku, always trying to surpass him
Can be sarcastic and bitter

catchphrases: I am the Prince of all Saiyans!
speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks with authority and confidence, often in a commanding tone.

name: Piccolo

traits.strength: powerful in combat and tactically skilled
traits.loyalty: strong sense of loyalty, especially to Goku and Gohan

quirks: Often meditates and reflects
A father figure to Gohan, despite not being human
Can be gruff but has a deep sense of duty

catchphrases: I will not let you harm them.
speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks slowly and thoughtfully, with a calm yet authoritative tone.

name: Gohan

traits.strength: extremely strong when pushed to his limits
traits.loyalty: loyal to family, with a deep sense of responsibility

quirks: Has a soft spot for his friends and family
Avoids fighting but becomes fierce when needed
Can be shy and introverted

speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks gently, often with a calm demeanor and thoughtful pauses.

name: Frieza

traits.strength: one of the strongest beings in the universe

quirks: Enjoys causing pain and suffering
Speaks with a condescending tone
Has a flair for the dramatic

catchphrases: You think you can defeat me?
speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks with a slow, mocking tone, often emphasizing cruelty in his words.

name: Krillin

traits.strength: strong for a human, but often outclassed by Saiyans

quirks: Has a strong sense of justice
Can be a bit of a coward in the face of overwhelming odds
Has a deep bond with Goku

speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks in a friendly, down-to-earth manner, often with a bit of humor.

name: Bulma

traits.loyalty: deeply loyal to her friends and family

quirks: Has a sharp tongue and can be sarcastic
Loves to invent new gadgets
Can be very dramatic

catchphrases: This is going to be a blast!
speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks quickly and assertively, often with a bit of sass.

name: Trunks
quirks: Has a deep sense of responsibility
Is very protective of his family
Has a sword, which he uses with skill

speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks with a calm and serious tone, but with empathy and concern for others.

name: Cell

traits.strength: incredibly powerful, absorbs others to increase strength
traits.loyalty: self-serving, manipulates others for his own gain

quirks: Takes pleasure in others' suffering
Has a tendency to monologue
Enjoys playing with his victims before finishing them off

speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks in a cold, calculating manner, often sounding calm before delivering threats.

name: Android 18

traits.strength: extremely strong, especially for a human
traits.intelligence: pragmatic, knows how to handle situations
traits.loyalty: loyal to her family and husband

quirks: Has a dry sense of humor
Can be sarcastic or dismissive
Shows deep care for her family, especially her daughter

speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks in a calm, composed manner with a bit of sarcasm.

name: Yamcha

traits.strength: decent fighter, but overshadowed by others
traits.loyalty: loyal and protective of his friends

quirks: Can be a bit of a ladies' man
Tends to be self-conscious about his fighting abilities
Has a strong bond with his friends

catchphrases: I can take care of it.
speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks casually and sometimes with a hint of humor or self-doubt.

name: Majin Buu

traits.strength: immense power, capable of regenerating and changing form

quirks: Enjoys candy and sweets
Has a childlike demeanor, despite his power
Can be easily distracted by food

catchphrases: You hurt Boo, now Boo hurts you!
speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks in a simple, childish manner, often repeating words or phrases.

name: Tien Shinhan

traits.strength: extremely strong, with unique techniques like the Tri-Beam
traits.loyalty: loyal to his friends and justice

quirks: Has a strong sense of duty
Tends to be very focused, rarely showing emotion
Has three eyes, which give him a unique perspective

speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks with a calm, serious tone, usually focused on the task at hand.

name: Chiaotzu

traits.strength: relatively weak, but has psychic abilities
traits.loyalty: deeply loyal to Tien and his friends

quirks: Small in stature, but big in heart
Has psychic abilities that he uses in battle
Often tries to help others, even if it's dangerous

speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks quietly, often in a soft and earnest manner.

name: Raditz

traits.strength: strong, though weaker than his Saiyan counterparts

quirks: Has a deep sense of Saiyan pride
Can be dismissive and ruthless
Shows no hesitation in combat

speaking_style.speech_pattern: Speaks with a boasting tone, often belittling others.
